title: What should you do 30-45 minutes before you go to bed? - Quora

response.answer_text: I know you said you hate reading, but there has to be something you’re passionate about. Whatever that is, there is something to be read about it, believe me. Maybe it’s a magazine or a short book, but there is something out there. Reading is a great sleep facilitator. I would also say you set some hard rules and keep to them. Stop all texting/posting 1 hour before bedtime, there could be something that’s said, posted or occurs when you check your phone that will keep you up for hours. I am a chronic insomniac, I’ve tried just about every single thing there is to try out there and those have been some of the most effective changes I’ve made to get to sleep quicker. Also, if you’re doing those things 30–45 minutes before bedtime, why not just slowly move your bedtime up by 30–45 minutes. You don’t have to stay awake until a certain time, your bedtime is your own.
